options.option: UCAS: Univ. of Calif. Archaeological Survey
UCES: Univ. of Calif. Egyptian Survey
1.6 Manufacturing, constructing, craft and professional pursuits
2. Secular dress and accoutrements, and adornment
2.3 Special ornaments, garb, and finery worn to battle by warrior (excluding status insignia)
2.4 Fine clothes and Accoutrements not used exclusively for status or religious purposes
3. Status objects and insignia of office
5.1 Religion and divination: Objects and garb associated with practices reflecting submission, devotion, obedience and service to supernatural agencies.
5.2 Magic: Objects associated with practices reflecting confidence in the ability to manipulate supernatural agencies
5.3 Objects relating to the secular and quasi-religious rites, pageants, and drama
5.6 Sports, games, amusements; gambling and pet accessories
6.2 Toys, childrens’ utensils, objects used in the education of children
7.4 Non-issued media of exchange, symbolic valuables, and associated containers
2: unassociated funerary object (UFO) with designated burial
3: unassociated funerary object (UFO) with undesignated burial
